mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users ( email, password, phone, birth, name, gender, marketing_agree, membership_grade, accesstoken, provider ) VALUES ( #{email}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{birth}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{marketingAgree}, 'BASIC', #{accessToken}, 'LOCAL' )

INSERT INTO users ( email, password, name, provider, provider_id, gender, marketing_agree, membership_grade, accesstoken ) VALUES ( #{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{provider}, #{providerId}, #{gender}, #{marketingAgree}, 'BASIC', #{accessToken} )
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET name = #{name}, phone = #{phone}, birth = #{birth}, gender = #{gender}, marketing_agree = #{marketingAgree} WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND deleted_at IS NULL
